title: La Vuelta Femenina Stage 2: Marianne Vos Delivers Vengeance After Visma TTT Fiasco
content:
Visma-Lease a Bike delivers Marianne Vos to the line for a sprint finish in a chaotic, crash-marred finale, Letizia Paternoster punches into race lead.

Read the full article at La Vuelta Femenina Stage 2: Marianne Vos Delivers Vengeance After Visma TTT Fiasco on Velo.
author: ahood
